law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 88, secs. 92 and 93, effective July 1, 1992. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 209, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 28.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Controlled substances -- Violation -- Use of confidential informants.
metadata.note: Repeal of this section became effective July 1, 1992, in compliance with 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 324, secs. 30 and 33.
